name: Bedtime Stories 2
description: Funny and cute interactive story about Hippo and her friends. This time we will get to know what the sea town citizens are doing before going to sleep. How many stars and planets can you open with a help of grandpa's telescope? Who is daddy's new book about? And what mysteries and secrets the inhabitants of Red Perch have? All this you could find in a new interactive story Bedtime Stories.
